db:sidebar.db:title: arc42help
db:sidebar.db:para: Short description of the functional requirements. Digest (or abstract) of the requirements documents. Reference to complete requirements documents (incl. version identification and location).

db:note.db:title: Contents
db:note.db:para: A compact summary of the functional environment of the system. Answers the following questions (at least approximately):

db:listitem.db:para: What happens in the systems environment?
Why is the system valuable or important?
Which problems does the system solve?

db:note.db:title: Motivation
db:note.db:para: From the point of view of the end users a system is created or modified to improve execution of a business activity. This essential architecture driver must not be neglected even though the quality of an architecture is mostly judged by its level of fulfillment of non-functional requirements.

db:note.db:title: Form
db:note.db:para: Short textual description, probably in tabular use-case format. The business context should in any case refer to the corresponding requirements documents.

db:note.db:title: Examples
db:note.db:para: Short descriptions of the most important:
